entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
